ing: 1 large bunch kale, stems removed, chopped
1 teaspoon balsamic vinaigrette, or to taste
des: "The apple, red peppers, and carrots add a nice sweetness to this dish, complemented by the balsamic vinaigrette."
ins: Heat olive in a skillet over medium heat. Saute red pepper, green pepper, mushrooms, green onions, garlic, and salt until tender but not soggy, 3 to 5 minutes. Add kale and cook until wilted and tender, 1 to 2 minutes. Add apple and shredded carrot, cook until warmed through, 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle with balsamic vinaigrette.
